an3.152:4.1: “When a foolish, incompetent bad person has three qualities they keep themselves broken and damaged. …
an3.152:4.2: Unethical deeds by way of body, speech, and mind. …
an3.152:5.1: When an astute, competent good person has three qualities they keep themselves healthy and whole. …
an3.152:5.2: Ethical deeds by way of body, speech, and mind. …”
